availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, resident. Lieutenant Colonel of the 3rd Kentucky Cavalry regiment. Applied for and received an amnesty pardon from President Andrew Johnson on October 16, 1865.

ab.bibl: Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series 319, Roll 0021 (accessed via Fold3.com). Jack Allen, Petitioner, Confederate Amnesty Papers, compiled 1865-1867, NARA Microfilm Publication, M1003, Record Group 94, roll 0025, (accessed via Fold3.com).
